name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Python Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in **Python**, **Django**, and **Django REST Framework**. Adept at building and integrating **RESTful APIs** and leveraging **Celery** and **RabbitMQ** for asynchronous processing. Proficient in implementing CI/CD pipelines and deploying applications on **AWS** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring robust and scalable cloud-native solutions. Skilled in utilizing **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and data streaming with **Kafka** to design high-performance databases and real-time analytics. Experienced in monitoring and observability using tools like **Datadog**, **Prometheus**, and **Sentry**.

With a strong understanding of event-driven architecture, I bring a proven track record of delivering secure, maintainable software solutions that comply with industry standards. Passionate about applying my expertise in a collaborative environment to drive impactful solutions in complex domains such as healthcare and finance. My background in automation and MLOps complements my software engineering skills, allowing me to contribute effectively to multidisciplinary teams.
